page.title: 08Shops on the Estate
page.content: There are several small shops on the{ {Duffryn Estate.} There is a knitting shop, a newsagent's shop, a fish and chip shop, a grocery shop and a video shop. We gave some children in the school a questionnaire to ask their parents about{Duffryn shop's.}We found that there was not everything at the shop's that people needed. Most people didn't like the shop's because they are to far away from their home's. They only went there very occasionally. The shop's were also too expensive.{Duffryn shop's}are not very popular.
